msg: as a side effect of Border.setTransparentResolver(boolean) it is now much easier to create bordered pages

author: jdonnerstag
msg: As a side effect of Border.setTransparentResolver(boolean) it is now much easier to create bordered pages. And because there is no need anymore to replace add(), removeAll(), remove(), replace(), autoAdd() I made them final.
